Package at.ac.uibk.plant_health.controllers

Class PersonController

java.lang.Object
at.ac.uibk.plant_health.controllers.PersonController
@RestController public class PersonController extends Object
Controller handling Person related Information (e.g. creating, updating, deleting Person)

      public PersonController()

  • Method Details

    • register

      @WriteOperation @PublicEndpoint @PostMapping("/register") public RestResponseEntity register(@RequestParam("username") String username, @RequestParam("password") String password, @RequestParam("email") String email)
      User Registration Endpoint for Users to create an Account by themselves.
      Parameters:
      username - The new Users username.
      password - The new Users password (needs to be already hashed).
      email - The new Users email.
      Returns:
      A RestResponse indicating whether the user could be created or not.

    • create

      @WriteOperation @AnyPermission(ADMIN) @PostMapping("/create-user") public RestResponseEntity create(@RequestParam("username") String username, @RequestParam("password") String password, @RequestParam("email") String email, @RequestParam("permissions") Set<Permission> permissions)
      User Creation Endpoint for Admins to manually create Accounts.
      Parameters:
      username - The new Users username.
      password - The new Users password (needs to be already hashed).
      email - The new Users email.
      permissions - The Permissions the new User should have.
      Returns:
      A RestResponse indicating whether the user could be created or not.

    • updateSettings

      @WriteOperation @PrincipalRequired(Person.class) @PostMapping("/update-settings") public RestResponseEntity updateSettings(Person person, @RequestParam(name="username",required=false) String username, @RequestParam(name="email",required=false) String email, @RequestParam(name="password",required=false) String password)
      Endpoint for a User to change his Account Settings.
      Parameters:
      person - Auto-injected Instance of the currently logged-in Person.
      username - The new username
      email - The new email
      password - The new Password
      Returns:
      A RESTResponse indicating Success

    • updateUser

      @WriteOperation @AnyPermission(ADMIN) @RequestMapping(value="/update-user", method={POST,PUT}) public RestResponseEntity updateUser(@RequestParam(name="personId") UUID personId, @RequestParam(name="username",required=false) String username, @RequestParam(name="email",required=false) String email, @RequestParam(name="permissions",required=false) Set<Permission> permissions, @RequestParam(name="password",required=false) String password)
      Endpoint for Admins to change/update a user
      Parameters:
      personId - The ID of the User to update
      username - The new username
      email - The new email
      password - The new Password
      permissions - The new Permissions
      Returns:
      A RESTResponse indicating Success

    • deleteUser

      @DeleteOperation @AnyPermission(ADMIN) @DeleteMapping("/delete-user") public RestResponseEntity deleteUser(@RequestParam("personId") UUID personId)
      Endpoint for Admins to delete a user.
      Parameters:
      personId - The ID of the User to delete
      Returns:
      A RestResponse indicating whether the operation was successful or not.

    • getAllUsers

      @ReadOperation @PrincipalRequired(Person.class) @AnyPermission(ADMIN) @GetMapping("/get-all-users") public RestResponse getAllUsers(Person person)
      Endpoint for Admins to get all users, except the calling user himself.
      Returns:
      A RestReponse containing a List of all users.

    • getAllGardener

      @ReadOperation @AnyPermission(ADMIN) @GetMapping("/get-all-gardener") public RestResponse getAllGardener()
      Endpoint for Admins to get all gardeners
      Returns:
      A list of all gardeners

    • getAllPermissions

      @ReadOperation @AnyPermission(ADMIN) @GetMapping("/get-all-permissions") public RestResponse getAllPermissions()
      Endpoint for Admins to get all possible Permission so that they don't need to be changed manually on frontend.
      Returns:
      A List of all possible Permissions.

    • getUserPermissions

      @ReadOperation @PrincipalRequired(Authenticable.class) @GetMapping("/get-user-permissions") public RestResponseEntity getUserPermissions(Person person)
